entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
